title: African Development Bank to triple Annual Climate Financing to nearly $5 billion by 2020 (African ...
text: ( Source : African Development Bank Group ) The President of the African Development Bank (AfDB), Akinwumi Adesina, announced on Friday, October 9 that the AfDB would nearly triple its annual climate financing to reach $5 billion a year by
